name: a blob adventure 5 ultimate
description:
Hey this is a game i made in c3

in this game you control a blob in a platformer game using the arrow keys

you can also double jump

one day a blob apeared in strange place he started hearing strange voices saying ''use arrow keys to move'' the dont know what to do the only option he have is try to climb this strange place PLAY IN 3 DIFERENT AREAS +1 BOSS  EASY TO USE CONTROLES THE CONTROLES ARE EASY TO USE BUT THE GAME IS REALY HARD AND CHALENGING

and also here is my discord server WARNING only come in this server if you are franch or know how to speak franch https://discord.gg/GtGKpqh
